name: Hentai Girl Puzzle SCI-FI
description:
Hentai Girl Puzzle SCI-FI

by Sanobusiness Games, is out now!!


This is our first standalone expansion of the franchise, with same difficulties as the one before, 10 new girls with 3 level of nudity each, and new modes:
  • STRIP MODE: undress the girls while completing the puzzles at maximum difficulty!
  • STANDARD MODES: choose at which level of nudity and which difficulty you want to complete the level.

Base game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1036970
